item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, February 13, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Resigning as Asahi Linux project lead (197 points | 95 comments)

3. Better text rendering in Chromium-based browsers on Windows (37 points | 30 comments)

6. SQL pipe syntax available in public preview in BigQuery (84 points | 40 comments)
7. Self hosted FLOSS fitness/workout tracker (112 points | 63 comments)

11. Cheap blood test detects pancreatic cancer before it spreads (136 points | 74 comments)

14. Basis of the Kalman Filter [pdf] (4 points | discuss)

22. Court Documents Shed New Light on DOGE Activity at Treasury Department (16 points | 1 comment)
23. The average CPU performance of PCs and notebooks fell for the first time (261 points | 199 comments)
24. NESFab – A new programming language for creating NES games (150 points | 8 comments)
25. Leaking the email of any YouTube user for $10k (1530 points | 429 comments)
26. The Prophet of Parking: A eulogy for the great Donald Shoup (281 points | 274 comments)
27. 5G networks meet consumer needs as mobile data growth slows (221 points | 321 comments)
28. Is NixOS truly reproducible? (225 points | 94 comments)
29. Imapsync (176 points | 48 comments)
30. Record-breaking neutrino is most energetic ever detected (213 points | 126 comments)
